evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text:
Count I
Violations of the Administrative Procedure Act – Arbitrary and Capricious and Without Observance of Procedure Required by Law (Against All Defendants)

extracted.value: Violations of the Administrative Procedure Act – Arbitrary and Capricious and Without Observance of Procedure Required by Law

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: These provisions, individually and collectively, also violate section 1554 of the ACA

extracted.value: Violations of section 1554 of the ACA

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: declare that the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II are arbitrary, capricious, without observance of proper procedure, or otherwise not in accordance with law under the Administrative Procedure Act

extracted.value: Declaratory judgment that the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II are unlawful

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: vacate and set aside the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II under the Administrative Procedure Act

extracted.value: Vacate and set aside the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II under the Administrative Procedure Act

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: stay the effective date of the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II under 5 U.S.C. § 705

extracted.value: Stay the effective date of the provisions of the 2025 Rule identified in Counts I and II under 5 U.S.C. § 705

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants from implementing the provisions identified in Counts I and II

extracted.value: Preliminary and permanent injunction enjoining Defendants from implementing the provisions identified in Counts I and II

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: award Plaintiffs their costs, attorneys’ fees, and other disbursements for this action

extracted.value: Award costs, attorneys’ fees, and other disbursements for this action

evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: grant such other and further relief as the Court may deem just and proper

extracted.value: Grant other and further relief as the Court may deem just and proper
